params.tokens: Array of token addresses to claim

emergencyWithdraw().details: Only allowed when the contract is paused (circuit breaker)

notifyRewardAmount(address,uint256).details: Uses balance-delta for ERC20 to support fee-on-transfer / deflationary tokens.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

retireRewardToken(address).details: Requires no queued rewards to avoid trapping undistributed amounts

stake(uint256).details: Flush queued rewards BEFORE changing balances so new stake doesnt share past queued rewards      Lock model: any new stake extends user's lock to now+LOCK_PERIOD (does not shorten).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimMany(address[]).notice: Claim multiple specific reward tokens in one transaction

creditOf(address,address).notice: Read per-user credit for a token (address(0) = ETH)

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Emergency withdraw LIQ without claiming rewards (forfeits rewards)

exit().notice: Exit completely (claim rewards and unstake all, if unlocked)

getPendingRewards(address).notice: Pending rewards for user across all tokens (includes any credit)

getRewardTokens().notice: Return all reward token addresses (address(0) = ETH)

notifyRewardAmount(address,uint256).notice: Notify new rewards for `token` (address(0) = ETH). Only notifiers may call.

recoverERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Recover arbitrary ERC20 tokens (not LIQ). Use with care.

retireRewardToken(address).notice: Retire a reward token from enumeration (users can still claim it individually)

rewardNotifiers(address).notice: Authorized accounts that may notify rewards (vault/treasury/owner/harvester etc.)

setMaxRewardTokens(uint256).notice: Set the maximum number of reward tokens

setStakeCaps(uint256,uint256).notice: Set per-user and global stake caps

unlockTime(address).notice: User -> earliest time they may unstake

withdrawCredit(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdraw any accrued credit (push->pull fallback), to a chosen address.
